title: Leaverbuster notification

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body:
My account hast just improved.
Does that mean I havent left games for a long time since I have been reported or did I just got punished?
Havent left any game in over 300 games.

If I just got punished, pls riot, cant you just fix your system of getting punished for a reason that isnt true?

replies.body: Quite the opposite, the notification is letting you know that your standing with [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) has improved.  You've been playing consistently without leaving games, thanks!  :D
